ðŸ“– Summary: BillionMail is an open-source mail server and email marketing platform designed to provide businesses and individuals with full control over their email campaigns. It offers features such as advanced analytics, customizable templates, and unlimited sending, all while ensuring privacy through self-hosting. The platform aims to be a cost-effective and feature-rich alternative to expensive, closed-source solutions.
